results.name: Additive with a(p^e) = A000045(e+1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
xref: Differs from A008481 for the first time at n=32, where a(32)=8, while A008481(32)=7.
